name: Just Plow
description:
Created all the assets myself (except some sound fx) in 5 days for the Blackthornprod game jam. Thanks for playing!

  • Clean the top platforms to earn money every round
  • ($1 per platform cleaned times wave number/2 = cash at the end of the round)
  • You need to collect the money from the bank
  • Get Gas
  • Repeat

Can be playing in the Web or downloaded for Windows. 

The Less you plow, the more room you have, but the less you make. 

What's your high score?

Thanks for playing!
